page.title: 11EVENTS IN HINXWORTH
page.content: Hinxworth cannot be accused of being without a soul. There is a plethora of organisations adding generously to the colour and flavour of its life. It is a mini society ready and able to jump into action when any part of it has a problem.For example when the village rallied round to plant 400 trees on the old sewage farm site or when the village hall needed extending or when the lead was stolen from the church roof and scores of straw bales were needed to secure it.Among the annual events are the village supper with its homespun entertainment, the WI's birthday party, the over 60's outing, the children's christmas party, the summer Jazz evening and the New Year's Eve party.Church gift Day shows the wish to keep the church in good repair for future generations and the newly restored bells will continue to ring.
